nodes.text: Imperial Firefighting droids were specialized droids used by the Galactic Empire.

Imperial Firefighting droids were human-sized robots of a brown coloration that were used to fight fires onboard Imperial ships. They used powerful hoses to fire streams of foam on nearby fires, and were also capable of rescuing trapped crew members. A group of them rescued Ranulf Trommer after his TIE/sa bomber was damaged after his successful mission to Aguarl 3.
